tool_description: Enhance image quality and upscale up to 4X with state-of-the-art Generative AI.
name: Super Image
title: Super Image

api_list.name: Get Job Result
api_list.description: Retrieve the v2 Generative AI job results (applicable to v2 only)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://super-image1.p.rapidapi.com/get_job"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Super Resolution (v1)
api_list.description: Use advanced Image Enhance algorithm to upscale. Non-AI based approach. Faster to run with fine quality.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://super-image1.p.rapidapi.com/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Super Resolution (v2) Generative AI
api_list.description: Use Generative AI (LLM) to upscale image. Greatly enhances the quality and level of detail in the upscaled images. This endpoint is asynchronous and can take some time to process.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://super-image1.p.rapidapi.com/v2/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
